entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low zero.

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon then rain. Wind southeast 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 in the evening then becoming light overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 16 April 2023
